article.title: SRI to Continue Operations of Ground Penetrating Radar
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SRI International, Menlo Park, California, was awarded an $8 million contract for material and equipment, including training center and mobile ground station, to continue operations of the Desert Owl-1 advanced airborne penetrating radar system.Â The U.S. Army Corp of Engineers, Vicksburg, Mississippi, is the contracting activity.
